questions.question_text: Parameshvarnī upāsanā rahevā sāru tyāgno paksh moļo karine ______ mandir karāvyā chhe. Temā jo thodo tyāg raheshe to pan upāsanā raheshe, to tene karine ghaņāk jīvnā kalyān thashe.
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Ga.Ma.27, Parameshvarnī upāsanā rahevā sāru tyāgno paksh moļo karine Bhagwānnā mandir karāvyā chhe.

questions.question_text: Jem Bhagwānnī mānasī pūjā kare tem ja je uttam haribhakta hoy tenī pan Bhagwānnī prasādīe karīne ______ mānasī pūjā kare.
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Va.5, jem Bhagwānnī mānasī pūjā kare tem ja je uttam haribhakta hoy tenī pan Bhagwānnī prasādīe karīne Bhagwān bheļī mānasī pūjā kare.

questions.question_text: Ane e Akşhar bīje rūpe karīne ______ sevāmā rahe chhe.
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Ga.Pa.21, e Akşhar bīje rūpe karīne Purushottam Nārāyaņnī sevāmā rahe chhe.

questions.question_text: Te Aksharnā be swarūp chhe - ek to nirākār ekras chaitanya chhe tene ______ kahīe, Brahmamahol kahīe.
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Ga.Pa.21, Aksharnā be swarūp chhe - ek to nirākār ekras chaitanya chhe tene Chidākāsh kahīe, Brahmamahol kahīe.

questions.question_text: Evī rīte Bhagwān ne uttam ______ je sant tenī ati preme karīne sarakhī sevā je kare to te kanishth bhakta hoy.
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Va.5, Bhagwān ne uttam lakshanvāļā je sant tenī ati preme karīne sarakhī sevā je kare to te kanishth bhakta hoy.

questions.question_text: Jem Bhagwānne arthe pāch rūpiyānu kharach kare tem ja te ______ arthe pan kharach kare.
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Va.5, jem Bhagwānne arthe pāch rūpiyānu kharach kare tem ja te moțā santne arthe pan kharach kare.
